ai-info-tooltip.description-disclaimer: Note! Content generated by artificial intelligence may contain errors.

competence.description: This section compiles the user's competences from different sources: workplaces, education, leisure activities, and other competences. You can view competences in more detail by expanding the sections. At the end, there is the user's own free-form description related to competences.
competence.title: Competence

favorites.description: Job and education opportunities saved by the user, collected as favorites in one place.
favorites.title: My favorites

cv.ingress: The owner of the competence path profile has shared this link so you can view their information. The link is valid until {{date}}.

interests.description: This section compiles the user's interests: interesting competences and professions, as well as the user's own free-form description related to interests.
interests.title: Interests

cv.osaamispolku-description: Life changes – and we are here to support you. Whether you are changing fields, learning something new, or improving your everyday life, we provide you with easily understandable information and inspiration to support your own path.
cv.title: Competence profile

form.date-in-the-past: The date cannot be in the past
form.date-too-far: The date is too far in the future

competence.search-disclaimer: Text used for searching competences - it is not saved

interest.search-disclaimer: Text used for searching interests - it is not saved

personal-details.description: You can edit your mother tongue and email address.
personal-details.title: Information retrieved from the population information system

share.delete-confirm-description: Are you sure you want to delete the share link?
share.description:
With a share link, you can share your information with people you choose. You decide what information you want to share with the link. The recipient does not need to log in to the Osaamispolku service.

Please note that anyone who receives the link can open it as long as the share link you created is valid. Only share the link with trusted parties or individuals whom you want to be able to view your shared information. You can delete the link you created at any time. After deletion, your information can no longer be viewed via the link.

basic-info.description: Optionally give the link a name (alias) and set its validity period. You can also add a note about who the link is intended for. The information to be shared is selected in the next step.
basic-info.name: Name
basic-info.title: Basic information

data-to-share.description: Choose which information you want to share. You can choose to share basic information and additionally decide whether to share your workplace, education, favorites, and plans.

modal.description-placeholder: E.g. who the link is for
modal.name: Link name

share.title: Share your competence profile

tmt-import-export.description:
You can import and export your data between Competence Path and Job Market Finland. The data does not update automatically; you decide what information you want to transfer between the services.

Imported data can be found in your competence profile. Exported data can be found in your Job Market Finland jobseeker profile. Check and edit the data as needed.

Go to Job Market Finland to view your data.

errors.forbidden: An error occurred while processing the authorization.
errors.not-found: User not found in Job Market Finland.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred in the service.

modal.step-1-description: You can export information from your competence profile to your Job Market Finland jobseeker profile. Export requires logging in to Job Market Finland and a separate authorization. No data will be exported without your permission, and you decide what information to share.
modal.step-2-description:
Authentication to Job Market Finland was successful and authorization is in place.

Exporting your competence profile data is in progress. You can close this notification.
modal.title: Export data to Job Market Finland

export.success: Your data was successfully exported to Job Market Finland.

modal.step-1-description: You can import information from your Job Market Finland jobseeker profile to your competence profile. Import requires logging in to Job Market Finland and a separate authorization. No data will be fetched without your permission, and you decide what information to share.
modal.step-2-description: Authentication to Job Market Finland was successful and authorization is in place. Importing your competence profile data is in progress.
modal.title: Import data from Job Market Finland

import.success: Your data was successfully imported from Job Market Finland

tmt-import-export.title: Import and export your data

banner.description: Login to the service and create your competence profile. This way, your information will be saved securely.
banner.title: Create your own competence profile

goals-card.description: Turn your favorites into goals and build plans to achieve them.
goals-card.title: Set goals and make plans

favorites-card.description: Explore education and career opportunities. Add the most interesting ones to your favorites and make them your own goals.
favorites-card.title: Find your favorites

banner.description: Find your education and career opportunities with the information you have selected. Try and explore different options.
banner.title: Explore your options

tool.description: Fill in your information on this page by mapping your interests and competences or by importing them from your competence profile. Try different combinations and update your opportunities with your data.

virtual-assistant.description: Hi! I am a bot and I help you find your interests. Talk to me and you will get suggestions that you can choose the ones that suit you best.
virtual-assistant.start: Let's get started – first, tell me what interests you right now?

duration-value.max-aria-label: Maximum duration, education lasting 6 years or longer

step-1.description:
Start by mapping your interests and competences by selecting the most suitable options from the suggestions based on your input.
You can also import data from your competence profile if you have created one. Using the competence profile requires logging in.
step-1.title: First choose what data to use for finding opportunities

step-2.description: In the summary of your data, you can see all the information used to find suitable opportunities for you. You can remove data that you don't want to take into account.
step-2.title: View and edit your selected data

step-3.description: Press the Update button when you have selected all the data you want. Remember to update the list whenever you change your data.
step-3.title: Update opportunities with your data

step-4.description: In opportunities, you'll see professions, job opportunities, degrees, and other education organized by suitability calculated based on your data. Explore them in more detail by clicking on the opportunity name. You can save favorites by logging in.
step-4.title: Explore and familiarize yourself with your opportunities

step-5.description: You can filter and sort the list of opportunities using the controls. This way you can better highlight options that suit your needs. You can also adjust how much weight is given to your selected interests and how much to competences in the suitability calculation.
step-5.title: Use controls to account for your needs

step-6.description:
Edit your data and try different combinations of interests and competences. If this feels difficult, help may be found in the links under Support for Reflection.
By logging in, you can save your data to your competence profile via Import from Competence Profile.
step-6.title: Try and explore different combinations

step-1.description: The tool's functions are divided into two tabs. Select the data to be used in the tool on the Your Data tab. View education and career opportunities suggested for you based on that data on the Your Opportunities tab.
step-1.title: Your Data and Your Opportunities tabs

step-2.description:
Start by mapping your interests and competences by selecting the most suitable options from the suggestions based on your input.
You can also import data from your competence profile if you have created one. Using the competence profile requires logging in.
step-2.title: First choose what data to use for finding opportunities

step-3.description: In the summary of your data, you can see all the information used to find suitable opportunities for you. You can remove data that you don't want to take into account.
step-3.title: View and edit your selected data

step-4.description: When you have selected the data you want, go to the Your Opportunities tab and press the Update button. Remember to update the list whenever you change your data.
step-4.title: Update opportunities with your data

step-5.description: In opportunities, you'll see professions, job opportunities, degrees, and other education organized by suitability calculated based on your data. Explore them in more detail by clicking on the opportunity name. You can save favorites by logging in.
step-5.title: Explore and familiarize yourself with your opportunities

step-6.description: You can filter and sort the list of opportunities using the controls. This way you can better highlight options that suit your needs. You can also adjust how much weight is given to your selected interests and how much to competences in the suitability calculation.
step-6.title: Use controls to account for your needs

step-7.description:
Edit your data and try different combinations of interests and competences on the Your Data tab. If this feels difficult, help may be found in the links under Support for Reflection.
By logging in, you can save your data to your competence profile via Import from Competence Profile.
step-7.title: Try and explore different combinations
